languages.text: "Если услышишь в ночи торжествующий вой — знай, это я иду тропой возмездия".
"Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."
languages.original_text: "Если услышишь в ночи торжествующий вой — знай, это я иду тропой возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Si escucha un aullido triunfal en la noche, sabrá que he emprendido el camino de la venganza».
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: «Si escucha un aullido triunfal en la noche, sabrá que he emprendido el camino de la venganza».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “如果你在夜里听到了胜利的狼嚎，那便是踏在复仇之路上的我发出来的。”
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: “如果你在夜里听到了胜利的狼嚎，那便是踏在复仇之路上的我发出来的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「もし夜に勝利の雄叫びが聞こえたら、俺の復讐がうまく行っている証拠だと思ってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「もし夜に勝利の雄叫びが聞こえたら、俺の復讐がうまく行っている証拠だと思ってくれ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous entendez un hurlement de triomphe dans la nuit, vous saurez que je me suis engagé sur la voie des représailles. »
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous entendez un hurlement de triomphe dans la nuit, vous saurez que je me suis engagé sur la voie des représailles. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr in der Nacht Triumphgeheul hören, so wisset, dass ich mich auf dem Pfad der Vergeltung befinde."
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr in der Nacht Triumphgeheul hören, so wisset, dass ich mich auf dem Pfad der Vergeltung befinde."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

languages.text: "Bir gece zafer ulumasını duyarsan bil ki intikamın yolunda yürüyorumdur."
languages.original_text: "Should you hear a howl of triumph in the night, know that I am on the path of retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Bir gece zafer ulumasını duyarsan bil ki intikam peşindeyim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
